title: [Large-Scale] Simulation-Based Education to Improve Registered Nurses' Perception of Their Role in Clinical Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory and Leadership Experience
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation training for nurse managers over 40 to strengthen role awareness in practical guidance, with modular design implementable in smartphone-centered environments

learning_goals: Eight role types of registered nurses can be differentiated contextually during interactions with practicum students.
Three or more effective communication strategies for student learning support can be practiced via VR simulations.
Role-performance plans applicable to real-world settings can be formulated and presented through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
